name: lumen-portfolio-minimal-and-modern-portfolio-template
title: Lumen Portfolio
desc: A minimalist and modern portfolio template perfect for showcase your work while allowing easy and seamless data updates.
article:
• Automatically generates both web pages and formal resumes for printing based on JSON files, making data updates easy and fast.
  • Perfect Lighthouse score
  • Responsive and modern design
  • SEO optimized
  • Dark/Light theme
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v3
